description: Calculate the optimized ranges of ID to use to backup a given type such that the total number of rows (primary + secondary) within the range are less than the given batchSize.

minimumId.description: The first ID in the range of IDs (inclusive)

maximumId.description: The last ID in the range of IDs (exclusive)

numberRowsPerRange.description: The number of rows that should contained in within each resulting ID range.
